KeyListEntry.name: toggle-on-all-workspaces
KeyListEntry.description: Toggle whether window is on all workspaces or just one

KeyListEntry.name: raise-or-lower
KeyListEntry.description: Raise window if it's covered by another window, otherwise lower it

KeyListEntry.name: tile-to-side-e
KeyListEntry.description: Tile window to east (right) side of screen

KeyListEntry.name: tile-to-side-w
KeyListEntry.description: Tile window to west (left) side of screen

KeyListEntry.name: tile-to-corner-nw
KeyListEntry.description: Tile window to north-west (top left) corner

KeyListEntry.name: tile-to-corner-ne
KeyListEntry.description: Tile window to north-east (top right) corner

KeyListEntry.name: tile-to-corner-sw
KeyListEntry.description: Tile window to south-west (bottom left) corner

KeyListEntry.name: tile-to-corner-se
KeyListEntry.description: Tile window to south-east (bottom right) corner

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-corner-nw
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to north-west (top left) corner

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-corner-ne
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to north-east (top right) corner

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-corner-sw
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to south-west (bottom left) corner

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-corner-se
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to south-east (bottom right) corner

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-side-n
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to north (top) side of screen

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-side-s
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to south (bottom) side of screen

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-side-e
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to east (right) side of screen

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-side-w
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to west (left) side of screen

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-center
KeyListEntry.description: Move window to center of screen

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-workspace-left
KeyListEntry.description: Move window one workspace to the left

KeyListEntry.name: move-to-workspace-right
KeyListEntry.description: Move window one workspace to the right
